about_the_game:
About ISEKAI CREATORS – Assets Pack:
This is a collection of assets that have been re-designed to match the specifications of "RPG Maker MZ" and "RPG Maker MV," based on the shared world concept project called "ISKEAI CREATORS" released for "RPG Maker Unite."

This package contains:
- the character portraits and facial variations of 10 characters: Kotarou, Misora, Alan, Meg, Roulier, Terry, Jewel, Gilbert, Hana, and "Rainy Day", masterfully designed by popular Illustrator “Gekitetsu” from Japan!
- 12 types of JRPG background images perfect for events and 4 types of battle background images, designed by Yuuri, the world design artist!
- 5 BGM tracks created by veteran Vocaloid composer “Nejishiki” are also included – of which contains the main theme song “Shifter”!
- Over 200 types of JRPG,Fantasy or Sci-Fi maptiles and objects, designed by Yuuri, the world design artist!

What is "ISEKAI CREATORS" Project?:
Isekai Creators is our ambitious project to create a “shared world” that anyone can expand upon! Personal commercial usage is also fully permitted – for details, visit our official site!
*You can use this asset without the concept of “ISEKAI CREATORS”.

About ISEKAI CREATORS – Assets Pack:
This is a collection of assets that have been re-designed to match the specifications of "RPG Maker MZ" and "RPG Maker MV," based on the shared world concept project called "ISKEAI CREATORS" released for "RPG Maker Unite."

This package contains:

- 12 types of JRPG background images perfect for events and 4 types of battle background images, designed by Yuuri, the world design artist!
- 5 BGM tracks created by veteran Vocaloid composer “Nejishiki” are also included – of which contains the main theme song “Shifter”!
- Over 200 types of JRPG,Fantasy or Sci-Fi maptiles and objects, designed by Yuuri, the world design artist!

What is "ISEKAI CREATORS" Project?:
Isekai Creators is our ambitious project to create a “shared world” that anyone can expand upon! Personal commercial usage is also fully permitted – for details, visit our official site!
